DOC.brief_summary: This study design document long-term outcome E1® Tibial Bearings use Vanguard® Knee System 50 patient receive total knee arthroplasty . All patient receive E1® Tibial Bearing Vanguard® knee replacement . Radiographic analysis patient report outcome use follow-up measure track wear , mechanical performance , patient satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Multicenter Evaluation E1® Tibial Bearing
DOC.criteria: Male Female 20 75 year age Subjects require total knee replacement Subjects diagnosis osteoarthritis , traumatic arthritis Subjects demonstrate ability return Massachusetts General Hospital followup next 10 year Subjects osteoporosis , osteomalacia , neuromuscular disease Incomplete insufficient soft tissue around knee Subjects limit life span Subjects difficulty comprehend study protocol reason Subjects disorder may impair bone formation Subjects whose bony structure deviate substantially general norm Female subject , may become , pregnant participating study
